subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Colombia’s Nairo Quintana increased his lead in the Giro d’Italia with a win in the 19th stage, a mountain time trial.
snippet: Colombia’s Nairo Quintana increased his lead in the Giro d’Italia with a win in the 19th stage, a mountain time trial.
